name: Seriously Big Soul
description:
SERIOUSLY BIG SOUL

is a game made by Debankita Basu, Judge Russell, and Joseph Yunis for a class
at UMass Amherst during the fall semester of 2020 using the Unity Engine. Please do not pay me money for this, it may be illegal to for several reasons :p

You can use a gamepad or keyboard to play, and the controls are given in the tutorial.

This is a proud rip of Katamari Damashii (2004) for educational purposes only and I do not claim to own the game mechanics nor the franchise. 

Joseph Yunis wrote the controls, some of the pickup logic, camera logic, ui pickup display logic,  all the tutorial level, the tutorial level song and designed some of the game tiles

Judge Russell wrote all the AI, all the level generation logic, level tiles, the main theme and its logic.

Debankita Basu made UI code and game tiles.

We used many free assets on the Unity Asset Store to make this game, and the full list is included in the README in the .zip file. If your asset is used in this game and I forgot to mention it, please let me know and I can correct the list.
